name: T_noun_poss_S_noun
hasQueryCode:
['SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
    ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .
    ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx .
    ?target rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx .
    ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma .
    ?source rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx .
    ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma .
    ?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?target doc:poss ?source .
}']
label: ['T-noun poss S-noun']

name: T_noun_to_be_S_noun_adj
hasQueryCode:
['"^(N|A|J)") .
    FILTER regex(?tpos', 'SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
    ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .
    ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx .
    ?target rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx .
    ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma .
    ?source rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx .
    ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma .
    ?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos .
    ?target doc:hasPOS ?tpos .
    FILTER regex(?spos', '"^N") .
    ?cop rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?cop doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?cop doc:xmod ?target .
    ?source doc:xcomp+ ?cop .
}']
label: ['T-noun to be S-noun-adj']

name: T_adj_mod_S_noun
hasQueryCode:
['SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
    ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .
    ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx .
    ?target rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx .
    ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma .
    ?source rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx .
    ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma .
    ?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos .
    ?target doc:hasPOS ?tpos .
    FILTER regex(?tpos', '"^(JJ|VBG)") .
    FILTER regex(?spos', '"^N") .
    ?target doc:ncmod ?source .    
}']
label: ['T-adj mod S-noun']

name: S_verb_T_dobj
hasQueryCode:
['"^(be|make|become|have|get|continue|use|go|finish|fail|help|manage|proceed|try|want|endeavor|attempt|start|begin)$"', '"^V") .
    FILTER (!regex(?slemma', 'SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
    ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .
    ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx .
    ?target rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx .
    ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma .
    ?source rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx .
    ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma .
    ?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source (doc:hasPOS|doc:hasRPOS) ?spos .
    ?target doc:dobj ?source .
    FILTER regex(?spos', '"i")) .
}']
label: ['S-verb T-dobj']

name: S_verb_Prep_T_noun_conj
hasQueryCode:
['"^V") .
    ?prep rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?prep doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?prep doc:hasPOS ?prepPOS .
    ?conj rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?conj doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?conj doc:hasPOS ?conjPOS .
    FILTER regex(?conjPOS', '"^C") .
    ?target doc:conj ?conj .
    ?conj doc:dobj ?prep .
    FILTER regex(?prepPOS', '"^I") .
    ?prep doc:iobj ?source .
}', 'SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
    ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .
    ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx .
    ?target rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx .
    ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma .
    ?source rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx .
    ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma .
    ?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos .
    FILTER regex(?spos']
label: ['S-verb Prep T-noun-conj']
comment: ['pull up out of poverty and unemployment']

name: T_subj_aspV_S_verb
hasQueryCode:
['SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
	?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .
	?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx .
	?target rdf:type doc:Word .
	?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx .
	?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma .
	?source rdf:type doc:Word .
	?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx .
	?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma .
	?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
	?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
	?aspv rdf:type doc:Word .
	?aspv doc:inSentence ?sent .
	?target doc:ncsubj ?aspv .
	?source doc:xcomp+ ?aspv .
	?source (doc:hasPOS|doc:hasRPOS) ?spos .
	?aspv doc:hasLemma ?avlemma .
	FILTER regex(?spos', '"i") .
}', '"^V") .
	FILTER regex(?avlemma', '"^(be|continue|become|use|go|finish|fail|help|manage|proceed|try|want|endeavor|attempt|start|stop|begin)$"']

name: S_verb_Prep_T_noun
hasQueryCode:
['"^I") .
    {
      ?prep doc:iobj ?source .
    } UNION {
      ?particle rdf:type doc:Word .
      ?particle doc:inSentence ?sent .
      ?particle doc:hasPOS ?partPOS .
      FILTER regex(?partPOS', 'SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
    ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .
    ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx .
    ?target rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx .
    ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma .
    ?source rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx .
    ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma .
    ?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos .
    FILTER regex(?spos', '"^RP") .
      ?particle doc:ncmod ?source .
      ?prep doc:iobj ?particle .
    }      
}', '"^V") .
    ?prep rdf:type doc:Word .
    ?prep doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?prep doc:hasPOS ?prepPOS .
    ?target doc:dobj ?prep .
    FILTER regex(?prepPOS']
label: ['S-verb Prep T-noun']
comment: ['slide into poverty OR pull up out of poverty\nwill also match passives: crushed by poverty']

    ?prep doc:pcomp ?cop .
    ?source doc:dobj ?prep .
}', '"^N") .
    FILTER regex(?tpos', 'SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx
WHERE {
    ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence .

    ?target doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:inSentence ?sent .
    ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos .
    ?target doc:hasPOS ?tpos .
    FILTER regex(?spos']
